snippet.title: Nintendo Switch Sports - Announcement Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Introducing a new iteration of the Wii Sports series, Nintendo Switch Sports! Play sports such as Bowling, Tennis, & Chambara as well as three new additional sports including Soccer, Badminton, and Volleyball.

Also, enjoy online play across all sports! Nintendo Switch Sports launches 4/29. 

A free update will arrive in the summer, expanding the Leg Strap accessory compatibility to Soccer matches. Additionally, a second free update planned to arrive in the Fall will add Golf to the playable sports! ⛳️

Pre-order now: https://nintendoswitchsports.nintendo.com/

#NintendoSwitchSports #NintendoDirect #NintendoSwitch

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/
